profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.2 Content streams
profile.description: Content streams shall not contain any operators not defined in ISO 32000-1 even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Content streams shall not contain any operators not defined in ISO 32000-1 even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators.

error.message: A content stream contains an operator not defined in ISO 32000-1
